about_the_game:
Dive into a sprawling futuristic metropolis, where towering skyscrapers pierce the skies, neon signs illuminate the night, and every corner hides secrets. From bustling markets to shadowy alleys, explore an open world brimming with danger, adventure, and untold mysteries waiting to be unraveled.

Experience a living, dynamic world where every character you meet has a story to tell and every street is alive with action. From heated arguments in neon-lit bars to unexpected chases through crowded alleys, the city feels alive, constantly shifting and responding to your choices and actions.

Step into a game that never stands still. With regular updates adding thrilling new missions, expansive locations, and groundbreaking features, there’s always something fresh to explore. Whether it’s uncovering new storylines or discovering enhanced gameplay mechanics, the adventure is ever-evolving.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit version 1909, revision .1350
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2 GB
  • Storage: 40000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into a dark cyberpunk world where megacorporations reign and technology merges with humanity. Explore a futuristic megacity, hack systems, fight enemies, and uncover the secrets of digital chaos. Your choices will shape the fate of this world.
